club_introduction: The club was established in 2009. Since then, we have been committed to providing a good environment for badminton fans, for both advanced players and beginners. Currently we have around 60 members. To help players improve their skills, regular training sessions take place every week.
name: Name
about_p1: Welcome to the German-Chinese Badminton Club. Here you will find information about the club and our latest developments.
about_p2: The German-Chinese Badminton Club was founded in 2009. We currently have about 60 members. We have always strived to provide badminton fans with a good playing environment. Here you will find your own playing partners, whether you are a beginner or an advanced player. The club has weekly training times to help everyone learn more about badminton and improve their techniques.
about_p3: If you share our passion for badminton, simply contact us and join us.
about_p4: ðŸ“£ For the upcoming season, we are currently looking for strong players for our teams.
contact_p1: Please contact us if you have any questions.
contact_membership: For trial training and membership applications
trial_p1: Unfortunately, we cannot accept new players into our club at the moment due to capacity reasons. Exceptions: We are looking for players for our teams with competition experience.
trial_p2: If you are interested in a trial training, please be sure to contact us in advance.

visitUs.title: Visit Us
visitUs.description: You are warmly welcome! To ensure your visit goes smoothly, we kindly ask you to schedule an appointment in advance. This helps us make sure that the court is not occupied by events and that there is enough capacity available for you.

1.title: New season starts in September
1.content: For the upcoming season, we are currently looking for strong players for our teams.

2.title: Limited Capacity for Trial Training
2.content: In order to continue providing optimal conditions for all members, our capacities are currently exhausted. Therefore, we are temporarily unable to accept new members. Good news for competitive players: You are exempt! If you would like to strengthen us with your experience, we look forward to seeing you!

about.title: About Our Club
about.content: The German-Chinese Badminton Club was founded in 2009. We currently have approximately 60 members. We have always been committed to providing badminton fans with an excellent playing environment. Here, whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, you will find your own playing partners. The club offers weekly training sessions to help everyone learn more about badminton and improve their skills.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.description: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. Reach out through any of the following methods:

membership.title: Membership & Trial Training
membership.description: For trial training and membership applications

applicationForm.submissionMode: What would you like to submit?
applicationForm.downloadDocumentsDesc: Download your membership documents for printing and signing.
applicationForm.accountHolderNote: Account holder information (if different from applicant):
applicationForm.accountHolderPreview: Account holder information (based on applicant details):
applicationForm.submittedMessage: Thank you for your membership application. We will review it and get back to you soon.

trialTraining.title: Trial Training Request
trialTraining.subtitle: Join us for a trial session to experience our badminton community

beginner.description: I'm new to badminton or have very limited experience

experienced.label: Experienced Player
experienced.description: I have significant badminton experience and play regularly

selfAssessed.description: I'd like to assess my level during the trial

beginnerNotice.title: Limited Capacity Notice
beginnerNotice.message: Unfortunately, we cannot accept new beginners at the moment due to capacity reasons. We are currently looking for experienced players for our teams.

experiencedInfo.title: Welcome Experienced Players!
experiencedInfo.message: Great! We're actively looking for strong players to join our teams. Please provide your contact details so we can get in touch.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your badminton experience, preferred playing times, or any questions you have...

success.title: Request Submitted Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for your interest. We will contact you soon with more information about trial training opportunities.
